bugfixes.bugfix: Fixed error in Windows version that occurred when working with non-ascii filenames.
Errors that occur during conversion now display an error dialog, instead of failing silently.
Various other small bug fixes and text file parsing tweaks.
Error information now sent to me so I can fix things (unless you turn it off in settings).
Added support for tracklists numbered "101, 102, 103"...
Queue resorted when entry information is changed.
When editing an entry, the choose cover dialog displays the previously chosen image instead of the image that is set as the default.
Fixed error that occurred when multiple audio file names began with the same single digit.
Fixed bug where shows marked in red or yellow remain that way even after the problem is fixed.
Track times in 4'44" format and track times which include hundredths of seconds are now recognized and removed from the track name.
Various other text file parsing improvements.

features.feature: The list of common cities used in text file parsing is now retrieved from the web so that it is always current. (If web access is unavailable, a local file will be used instead).

bugfixes.bugfix: Shows with filenames numbered like "1, 2, 3" instead of "01, 02, 03" no longer converted with mismatched tracks.
Untitled tracks no longer appear in iTunes with a single number (the track number minus one) as the title, but instead appear blank.

features.feature: Files can now be played within the "confirm metadata" dialog.
The new "Refresh Tracklist" button allows you to fix a malformed text file directly in the program and apply the changes to the tracklist.
Shows no longer rejected if there is a mismatch between number of tracks and number of files.
Added the option to not use cover art.
Added date formats YY-MM-DD and YY-DD-MM

bugfixes.bugfix: Fixed Memory Error when converting large files.
Many improvements to text file parsing.
Progress bar when loading multiple shows is more accurate (now the queue fills up immediately after it reaches 100%).
Invalid items in queue are more legible.
Shows accepted even if no tracklist is found.
Added support for indented tracklists.
Fixed bug that prevented FLAC files with ID3 tags from being added to the queue.
Fixed Mac bug that prevented shows whose text files use multibyte encodings from being added to the queue.
Fixed occasional "Interrupted system call" error on Mac.
Various improvements to text file parsing.
Various other fixes.
Converted shows no longer marked as "part of a compilation".
Cover art images now found in subfolders.
Load time for JPEGs shortened.
Support for GIFs fixed.
Tracklists with mistakenly skipped or repeated track numbers no longer invalid.
Mac crash on startup fixed.
Text files using only carriage returns for newlines now read correctly.
Better handling of text files containing non-ascii characters.

features.feature: Support for shows already in ALAC format.

bugfixes.bugfix: Converting SHN files no longer causes crashes or lockups.
If settings files become corrupted or changed, BootTunes will start normally and replace them.
Track lengths in tracklist no longer included in the track name.
Shows now converted in the order in which they appear in the queue.
When converting multiple shows at once when iTunes is not open, output files from later shows will no longer overwrite earlier ones.
Fixed Windows 7 crash when starting a second batch in the same session.
Tracklist detection improved.

features.feature: Added "Restore Defaults" button to settings dialog.
